front.title: Test Automation for Layer2/3 devices in the Internetworking Environment

abstract.t: Test Automation is a process that is being adopted by vendorsaggresively to broaden the scope for testing. Automationof testing of L2/L3 devices can also enable faster and 'always on'mode of test environment in the Test labs, thus maximizing usage oflab infrastructure, round the clock, without human intervention.More often than not, lack of standards, can cause an automationarchitecture to go awry and the cost of the same could be catastrophic.Hence this informational draft endeavours to bring forth a standardframework for automation, which can be referred to, by test teams ofvarious network equipment vendors and users.
